response.overview: Paavam Paramashudhan is a Home Cinema directed by Salam Kodiyathur, a Malayalam-language comedy-drama that explores various interconnected domestic and community conflicts. The narrative unfolds through dialogues and situations involving characters like Kuttialikka, Rahman, Majeed, Firoz, and their families, addressing themes such as gossip, financial struggles, family disputes, marital trust, misunderstandings, and community meddling
response.title: Paavam Paramashudhan
